title: Generalized Pochhammer symbol
summary: In mathematics, the generalized Pochhammer symbol of parameter α > 0 {\displaystyle \alpha >0} and partition κ = ( κ 1 , κ 2 , … , κ m ) {\displaystyle \kappa =(\kappa _{1},\kappa _{2},\ldots ,\kappa _{m})} generalizes the classical Pochhammer symbol, named after Leo August Pochhammer, and is defined as
